3. Examples¶

3.1. Free propagation of focused beam¶

import bpm

m = bpm.Bpm3d(size = (1024,1024,800),

units = (.1,.1,.1), lam = .5,

boundary = “absorption”)

field = m.propagate(u0 = m.initial.focus(zfoc = 10.))

3.2. Plane wave on sphere (with scattering)¶

import bpm

dn = fill_array_with_sphere_dn()

m = bpm.Bpm3d(size = (1024,1024,800),

units = (.1,.1,.1), lam = .5,

dn = dn, boundary = “absorption”)

field, cross_section = m.propagate(u0 = m.initial.plane_wave(), return_scattering = True)
